Name: Sanctuary Bard
Desc: You have been halted for far too long by the verse of this roadside bard.\nEven with pursuers close behind, his haunting melody roots you in place.\nThanks to the scorching sun, his throat grows dry. The melody fades, and your clarity returns.
LocationDesc: The melody is mesmerizing and intoxicating.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Sanctuary Bard
Desc: You seize the moment, draw your weapon, and point the gun at the Sanctuary Bard who is draped in complicated runes.
RoleContents: ['Long live... the Supreme Heaven...']
LocationDesc: The melody is mesmerizing and intoxicating.

Name: Sanctuary Bard

LocationDesc: The melody is mesmerizing and intoxicating.

Name: Sanctuary Bard

RoleContents: ['The Eternal Sun awakens from the lake of blood. Only by bathing it in the blood of foes shall the Supreme Heaven grant us the Night of Salvation.']

Name: Cataclysm Remnants
Desc: Even locusts find no grain in these plague-ravaged fields.\nMutated insects now crave flesh and blood. Blood-sucking locusts have become the second plague to descend upon this empty village.
LocationDesc: The Cataclysm's remnants still haunt the village.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cataclysm Remnants
Desc: The flickering rune at the village entrance has attracted the locusts.\nAs the swarm darkens the sky, an elderly man, too frail to flee, raises a trembling fist to the sky.
RoleContents: ['Three times... This is the third time already! Since those angels left their "blessed" charm, our village has suffered three plagues! O Supreme Heaven—what did we do to deserve this?!']
LocationDesc: The Cataclysm's remnants still haunt the village.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cataclysm Remnants
Desc: You grab the rune. The locusts swarm you immediately, leaving you no choice but to shield the elder and prepare to fight.
LocationDesc: The Cataclysm's remnants still haunt the village.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cataclysm Remnants
Desc: Before the next disaster descends, you carry the old man away. Behind you, flames consume the village. The elder looks back, eyes full of sorrow, to where his home once stood.
LocationDesc: The Cataclysm's remnants still haunt the village.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cataclysm Remnants
Desc: You know this is but the beginning. Until the night is reclaimed, such tragedies will play out again and again. Blood-sucking locusts swarm behind you. You continue fighting while shielding the elder and retreating.
LocationDesc: The Cataclysm's remnants still haunt the village.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Remnants of the Tribunal
Desc: The eternal day never sleeps, but you need to rest. An inn stands by the roadside, offering a perfect place for respite.
LocationDesc: Open up! Tribunal inspection!
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Remnants of the Tribunal
Desc: Unfortunately, your arrival couldn't have been worse timed. Several Tribunal Inquisitors are conducting a surprise inspection, turning the once-restful inn into a powder keg of tension.\nAs you arrive, every eye turns toward you.
LocationDesc: Open up! Tribunal inspection!
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Remnants of the Tribunal
Desc: "In the name of the All-Knowing Supreme Heaven, citizen, I ask you: In this age of calamity, do you still hold fast to your faith? Do you believe in the Supreme Heaven's salvation?"
RoleContents: ['Even in these dark times, we must never abandon our faith.']
LocationDesc: Open up! Tribunal inspection!
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Remnants of the Tribunal
Desc: Your answer satisfies the inquisitor but causes angry curses to erupt in the inn. The locals grab their weapons and surround you.
LocationDesc: Open up! Tribunal inspection!
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Remnants of the Tribunal
Desc: Your bold words earn cheers from the crowd. Humiliated, the inquisitor swings his flail at your head.
LocationDesc: Open up! Tribunal inspection!

Name: Rebuild the Homeland
Desc: You arrive at a crumbling refugee outpost. Unlike other disaster-stricken areas, this one is alive with hope. The survivors have painted inspiring slogans on the remaining walls.
LocationDesc: "Even angels cannot break our wings."
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Rebuild the Homeland
Desc: They haven't abandoned their ruined homeland. Instead, they choose to rebuild it.
RoleContents: ['Move those stones over—come on, folks, we have to hurry! We need to be ready for the next calamity!']
LocationDesc: "Even angels cannot break our wings."
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Rebuild the Homeland
Desc: With your help, construction progresses rapidly. In gratitude, the refugees offer you some supplies.
LocationDesc: "Even angels cannot break our wings."

Name: Rebuild the Homeland

Name: Rebuild the Homeland
Desc: Along the way, you discover a lot of useful military gear from an abandoned camp.

Name: Rebuild the Homeland
Desc: But just as you prepare to leave, a shrill cry pierces the air. A large number of angels descend from the sky, cutting off your escape.
LocationDesc: "Even angels cannot break our wings."

Name: The Dead
Desc: A staggering corpse blocks your path. Hoping to avoid trouble, you try to avoid it, but the creature refuses to let you pass.\nIt stretches out a shriveled, rotting hand, craving your death like a hyena craving for blood and flesh.
RoleContents: ['Rgh—Aargh...']
LocationDesc: A soul denied rest stands before you.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Dead
Desc: Without a word, you just turn and run. Judging by the living dead's tottering gait, there's no way it can catch you.
LocationDesc: A soul denied rest stands before you.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Dead
Desc: Just as you start to feel relieved, the swamp beneath you trembles like boiling water. Countless revenants erupt from the muck, cutting off your escape.
LocationDesc: A soul denied rest stands before you.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Dead
Desc: You swiftly dispatch the nearest living dead. It lets out a piercing wail before collapsing into the bog.
LocationDesc: A soul denied rest stands before you.

Name: The Dead
Desc: But that wail has drawn even more from the darkness...
LocationDesc: A soul denied rest stands before you.

Name: Wasteland Hunting
Desc: Across the vast plains, herds of corrupted bison surge over the horizon. Frenzied and blind, they charge like living war chariots, crushing everything in their path.\nUnfortunately, the town behind you lies directly in their way.
RoleContents: ["Dammit, I think we've been set up. Are we still doing this job?"]
LocationDesc: You feel the earth trembling beneath your feet.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Wasteland Hunting
Desc: You rally every armed personnel and set up defenses on the spot, determined to halt the stampede.
LocationDesc: You feel the earth trembling beneath your feet.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Wasteland Hunting
Desc: You evacuate the townspeople as fast as possible, but a few bison manage to break through the barricades, charging straight into your defense.
LocationDesc: You feel the earth trembling beneath your feet.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Railway Workers
Desc: Since the Cataclysm, no one has used the alchemy matrix to power these beasts of steel. Still, the stingy Sanctuary allows no rest for its war machines.\nThe unfortunate railworkers have been forced to become haulers, their flesh and blood now the "inexhaustible" fuel of the train.
RoleContents: ["S-sir! Archangel! There are eighteen teams of us to pull the cargo in shifts! We don't need to eat!"]
LocationDesc: The haulers drag the train forward across the burning tracks of sulfur.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Railway Workers
Desc: Turns out the angel guarding this train is an amateur. He is even hosting a feast onboard.\nClearly, he never imagined a group of rebels would crash his party.
LocationDesc: The haulers drag the train forward across the burning tracks of sulfur.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Railway Workers
Desc: The train lost its power and slowly came to a halt, but it took the sluggish angels aboard a long time to realize this.\nYou lead the railway workers to board the train that rightfully belonged to them.
LocationDesc: The haulers drag the train forward across the burning tracks of sulfur.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Historical Relic
Desc: These ruins date back long before the Cataclysm. Time itself seems to have stopped flowing within them. The worn stone walls are covered in intricate, graffiti-like carvings. Perhaps they contain truths that transcend this world, but none of you can decipher them.
RoleContents: ["I know this triangular symbol... It's a prophecy of the tangled fate among angels, demons, and humankind of our times!"]
LocationDesc: The dust-covered ruins have finally seen new visitors.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Historical Relic
Desc: Even though you know nothing about the ancient knowledge from the ruins, it doesn't matter. As long as it can all be converted into gold, Almighty Mammon will make everyone understand it. Mammon!
LocationDesc: The dust-covered ruins have finally seen new visitors.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Historical Relic
Desc: Your bold operation awakens the slumbering angels in the ruins. Who knows why they're even here or how long they've been lurking.
LocationDesc: The dust-covered ruins have finally seen new visitors.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Historical Relic
Desc: It seems the Supreme Heaven does not appreciate the false history you have been spreading. A squad of angels, just happening to be on patrol, descends from the sky. They clearly want to shut your mouth forever before you spread more of it.
LocationDesc: The dust-covered ruins have finally seen new visitors.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Army Squad
Desc: You and Watanabe follow hoofprints and spot a small squad bearing the Army's eagle banner.\nTheir wagons are loaded with fresh, dripping "blood tax," slowly making their way down the main road.
RoleContents: ['The terrain ahead is narrow, perfect for an ambush. Want me to flank?']
LocationDesc: The eagle banner flaps proudly in a haze of dust.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Army Squad
Desc: You ask Watanabe to wait along their route, waiting for them to march blindly into your deadly trap.
LocationDesc: The eagle banner flaps proudly in a haze of dust.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Army Squad
Desc: You continue tracking the unit. Just as you guessed, they bring their spoils to a large Iron Army outpost. You and Watanabe immediately decide to strike, aiming to wipe them out for good.
LocationDesc: The eagle banner flaps proudly in a haze of dust.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Battlefield of the Flame Demons
Desc: A gaping crater scars the empty plain, catching your attention.\nHeat licks your hair as you approach, revealing a scorched wasteland as if seared by meteors. Gouts of flame spurt from cracks in the charred soil.
RoleContents: ['...My ancestors fought demons here.']
LocationDesc: The searing wasteland bears witness to the fall of countless demons.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Battlefield of the Flame Demons
Desc: Years of burning seem to have erased all other traces. You wander the battlefield, finding little of value.
LocationDesc: The searing wasteland bears witness to the fall of countless demons.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Battlefield of the Flame Demons
Desc: However, the overwhelming presence of this place has rewritten your understanding of war.
LocationDesc: The searing wasteland bears witness to the fall of countless demons.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Battlefield of the Flame Demons
Desc: Watanabe surveys the scene, "Flame Demons are terrifying high-rank demons. When they die..." He looks at the ruined bones beneath your feet, "Their corpses detonate, creating an eternal sea of flames that can... burn for a century."
LocationDesc: The searing wasteland bears witness to the fall of countless demons.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Battlefield of the Flame Demons
Desc: Afterward, Watanabe shares much of his demon-fighting knowledge. You feel like you have learned a lot.
LocationDesc: The searing wasteland bears witness to the fall of countless demons.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cannon Foundry
Desc: Passing through a ruined city, Watanabe leads you into a long-abandoned factory.\nSunlight pierces the dust, illuminating many intricate machines—like sentinels of a forgotten castle awaiting their master's return.
RoleContents: ['Humanity forged a god-slaying weapon, Halo Cannon, in this very place.']
LocationDesc: The once-lost god-slaying weapon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cannon Foundry
Desc: You salvage some rare materials left behind by the craftsmen and continue your journey through the warzone overrun with angels.
LocationDesc: The once-lost god-slaying weapon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cannon Foundry
Desc: This weapon was forged by the Iron Army in alliance with the demons. Its frame was made from Sanctuary mithril, its core cast from hellforged steel to withstand extreme heat. Along with this war machine, they also forged two priceless Halo Bullets.\nOne of them pierced the chest of the Cardinal Deity, ending his reign that lasted a thousand years.
LocationDesc: The once-lost god-slaying weapon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Cannon Foundry
Desc: After listening to Watanabe's story, you gather some pre-cataclysmic tools, hoping to restore humanity's lost crafts one day.
LocationDesc: The once-lost god-slaying weapon.

Name: Devil's Shooting Contest
Desc: After a flash of warped light, a wandering devil appears. Behind him, a wide cart holds rows of straw targets.\nThe devil from Mammon's Agency grins slyly and invites you to experience a trending new game from Purgatory.
RoleContents: ["Come and try Mammon's Shooting Contest! The more targets you hit, the bigger the prize!"]
LocationDesc: Blinding light bursts from the rift. You feel like you have heard raucous drums and gongs from the other side.

LocationDesc: Blinding light bursts from the rift. You feel like you have heard raucous drums and gongs from the other side.

Name: Armed Refugees
Desc: A group of refugees, hearing that you and Watanabe have raised the banner of rebellion, eagerly offer supplies and weapons, begging to join your cause.
RoleContents: ['Their enthusiasm is hard to refuse, but a larger group risks exposing your position.']
LocationDesc: The sparks of rebellion are slowly gathering.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Armed Refugees
Desc: For the sake of your plans—and to keep these refugees from danger—you ultimately decline their offer.\nBefore leaving, their leader shoves supplies into your hands, urging you to stay safe.
LocationDesc: The sparks of rebellion are slowly gathering.

Name: Armed Refugees
Desc: As your rebellion grows in strength, more and more refugees have come to join, growing your forces day by day.
LocationDesc: The sparks of rebellion are slowly gathering.

Name: Prioritize Ground Targets
Desc: The violent shock has drawn the attention of nearby angel garrisons. Like a tidal wave, they come after you along the railway.
RoleContents: ['You shall not pass.']
LocationDesc: The angels on the ground charge at you like an unstoppable tide.
LocationDescUnselect: The angels on the ground charge at you like an unstoppable tide.

Name: Prioritize Aerial Targets
Desc: Countless angels descend from the clouds and blood-soaked sky, diving toward the derailed train.
RoleContents: ['You shall not pass.']
LocationDesc: A large batch of angel reinforcements has arrived from above.
LocationDescUnselect: A large batch of angel reinforcements has arrived from above.

Name: Focus Fire on the Train
Desc: The firearms surround the train like a noose, unleashing a hail of bullets into it.
RoleContents: ['—Open fire!']
LocationDesc: Command the muskets of "War" to focus on the enemies inside the train.
LocationDescUnselect: Command the muskets of "War" to focus on the enemies inside the train.

Name: Focus Fire on the Perimeter
Desc: Countless muskets fill the sky in a crimson formation, their barrels spitting flames as they intercept the Sanctuary reinforcements approaching the train.
RoleContents: ['—Open fire!']
LocationDesc: Command the muskets of "War" to prioritize external enemies.
LocationDescUnselect: Command the muskets of "War" to prioritize external enemies.

Name: Pursue the Fleeing Enemies
Desc: You cannot let these bloodthirsty enemies return to the Sanctuary. Hunt down the fleeing remnants—leave none alive.
RoleContents: ['You have nowhere to run.']
LocationDesc: Angels inside the train rush out in disarray, attempting to escape.
LocationDescUnselect: Angels inside the train rush out in disarray, attempting to escape.

Name: Assist Allies
Desc: The number of angels in the train exceeds your expectations. You must apply suppressive fire to quickly seize control of the train.
RoleContents: ['You have nowhere to run.']
LocationDesc: Command "War" to support the operation inside the train.
LocationDescUnselect: Command "War" to support the operation inside the train.

Name: Lord of War
Desc: In one battle, Watanabe summons innumerable muskets from the air. They soar like dragons, gleaming under the scorching sun, spitting fire to devour your enemies.\n\nEvery musket is identical—somewhat antiquated, with demonic head engravings on their stocks.
LocationDesc: "To him who sat upon the horse was given the power to take peace from the earth, and a great sword was bestowed upon him."
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Lord of War
Desc: The bizarre sight pierces your memories. Fragments of the past surface—you realize this is the authority you had bestowed upon the War Knight.
RoleContents: ["Demonic muskets... I'm starting to remember this power."]
LocationDesc: "To him who sat upon the horse was given the power to take peace from the earth, and a great sword was bestowed upon him."
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: His Past
Desc: You trek across the desolate wasteland. Watanabe walks ahead, meticulously planning each rest stop, scavenging for food and water.\n\nYou are amazed by his survival skills and ask where he learned them. "My father, 'Gyrfalcon'," he replies flatly, then gazes at the blood-red sky. "...He was the former commander of the Iron Army."
LocationDesc: The teachings of the deceased inspire the living to keep going.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: His Past
Desc: Memories of the Iron Army flood back. Seeing Watanabe lost in thought, you stop pressing further.\nAfter all, your journey has just begun. There is still plenty of time to get to know each other.
RoleContents: ["Let's keep moving."]
LocationDesc: The teachings of the deceased inspire the living to keep going.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Future Plans
Desc:
During your travels, you notice Watanabe meticulously recording everything—enemies encountered, daily supply usage, nearby terrain...
He even questions the locals about angel and Iron Army movements, gathering all possible intelligence on the Sanctuary.

Watching this, you start to remember that the two of you are crafting a bold "plan"...
RoleContents: ["Let's keep moving."]
LocationDesc: Watanabe seems to be scheming something.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Rusted Steel
Desc: As days pass, Watanabe often shares stories of the Iron Army's past.\nOnce an army that fought demons to protect this land, the Iron Army is now collaborating with the angels, turning their blades against the innocents. You cannot help but feel sentimental.
LocationDesc: The shield that once protected the innocents has turned into a bloodstained weapon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Rusted Steel
Desc: The Iron Army's corruption runs deeper than expected. Perhaps the Sanctuary has already corrupted its core leadership—just as it did with Ballard—and turned them into their thralls.
RoleContents: ['Those manipulated by the Sanctuary will become obedient puppets. Death is their only salvation.']
LocationDesc: The shield that once protected the innocents has turned into a bloodstained weapon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Scherman Bastion
Desc: Once a thriving gold town in Scorched Borderland, Scherman Bastion now lies in ruins before you.
LocationDesc: Life is vulnerable. Gold is hard to find.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Scherman Bastion
Desc: You rush in to search for survivors, but the city is already a desolate graveyard.\n\nWatanabe examines signs of encampments outside, concluding the massacre was recent. The Iron Army might still be nearby.
RoleContents: ['Search complete... No survivors found.']
LocationDesc: Life is vulnerable. Gold is hard to find.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Rolling Stone Valley
Desc: Famous for its "walking stones," this valley was once a vital transportation hub connecting the east and the west of the Scorched Borderland.
LocationDesc: The valley is eerily quiet.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Rolling Stone Valley
Desc: You have learned from nearby refugees that, despite being a vital transportation hub, Rolling Stone Valley has suffered no angelic attacks lately.\nBlack market merchants from near and far all choose this route to ship valuable goods to the west.
RoleContents: ['This is unnatural. Could it be related to the Iron Army?']
LocationDesc: The valley is eerily quiet.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Merchants Attacked
Desc: You rescued a merchant from an angel attack.\n\nThe merchant regularly travels between the east and the west of the Scorched Borderland. He gratefully offers you anything you need at no cost. Horses, goods, supplies... all at your disposal.
RoleContents: ['We still have a long way ahead. Maybe we could borrow his cart?']
LocationDesc: You have encountered a caravan under angel assault.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Threat of the Lizards
Desc: A nearby town was recently attacked by some giant lizards.\n\nLocals say these lizards used to be docile, but since the last Cataclysm, their temperaments have drastically changed, and they now frequently attack travelers.
LocationDesc: Recently, a nearby town was attacked by giant lizards.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Threat of the Lizards
Desc: Following the clues given by the villagers, you track down the lair of these fire-breathing lizards with blistered skin.\n\nYou wipe them out with ease, yet you cannot help but feel alarmed: the Cataclysm has corroded the Scorched Earth's natural environment, giving rise to such abominations.
RoleContents: ['The entire world is rotting in this blood rain. We must end this war fast.']
LocationDesc: Recently, a nearby town was attacked by giant lizards.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Magical Pet
Desc: These days, the raven Morigan has been following you and often triggers the dreamcatcher that detects demons, causing unnecessary trouble in human settlements.\n\nThough you insist it keep its distance, its master, Nirvatia, demands it stay by your side at all times to protect you... Or rather, spy on your every move.
RoleContents: ['Ugh, I hate getting caught between the two of you—being a bird is so hard!']
LocationDesc: The mechanical raven has brought you some trouble.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Banner of Rebellion
Desc: You have fully taken over Rusty Yoke's defenses, eliminating the angels around the outskirts and reclaiming plenty of supplies and land.\n\nAs you gain a firm foothold, the Gray Raven's name begins to spread widely among the rebel forces across the land. Your reputation soars, and you have essentially become the spiritual leader of all the rebel forces in the Scorched Borderland.
LocationDesc: You have become the hope of this land.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Banner of Rebellion
Desc: Human guerrilla forces from all over are gathering and moving toward Rusty Yoke, hoping to join your ranks.
RoleContents: ['They are all battle-hardened veterans and can be taken into your team.']
LocationDesc: You have become the hope of this land.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Gathering Forces
Desc: Recently, your scouts have observed that the Army forces scattered throughout the Scorched Borderland are slowly gathering toward the Halo Fortress.\n\nThe Iron Army would not pull back its forces for no reason—there is a high possibility they are preparing to launch a large-scale offensive on rebel outposts, including Rusty Yoke.
RoleContents: ['The Army has endless reinforcements. You must find a way to seize the fortress.']
LocationDesc: The scouts have brought back disturbing news.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Fatal Manhunt
Desc: Today, Taco caught two suspicious individuals outside the town.\nUnder your interrogation, one of them claimed to be a bounty hunter on his way to the Halo Fortress to claim a reward, and the other was the wanted criminal he had captured.
LocationDesc: Taco caught two suspicious individuals.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Fatal Manhunt
Desc: According to the bounty hunter, the Iron Army offers high prizes to drive bounty hunters to eliminate rebels.\nCaptured fugitives are thrown into the fortress dungeons for brutal tortures.
RoleContents: ['The man he captured is a brave fighter against the Sanctuary. We have released him.']
LocationDesc: Taco caught two suspicious individuals.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Fear of Death of Iron
Desc:
After a battle, you and Watanabe rest in the town tavern and overhear some soldiers talking about the tales of the Three Ashfire Heroes.

When they speak of Death of Iron, one of them says with a trembling voice, "He killed the Locust Flame Demon, a Demon Lord, with his own hands... How do we even fight him?"
It seems that the soldiers have a fear of Death of Iron.
RoleContents: ['We must deal with Death of Iron personally.']
LocationDesc: A rest in the tavern.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Whereabouts of the Halo Bullets
Desc: Watanabe asks Taco and the others about the whereabouts of the "Halo Bullets."\n\nTucker says that after Gyrfalcon died, Death of Iron preserved all of his personal belongings untouched. Therefore, the "Halo Bullets" that Gyrfalcon kept are very likely still with Death of Iron.
RoleContents: ['We must take back the great cannon and silver bullets. They are the key to defeating the Sanctuary.']
LocationName: The Whereabouts of the Halo Bullets
LocationDesc: Watanabe asks Taco for more information.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Refugee Crisis
Desc: Hearing that the famed Gray Raven had arrived at Rusty Yoke Town, many refugees from afar have brought their families and made their way through numerous blockades to the town, hoping to live under your protection.\n\nAs more and more refugees arrive, the town's already dire supplies become even more strained. You must break through the Sanctuary's blockade to expand production and stabilize supplies.
RoleContents: ['Everyone, stay in the line. One scoop per person!']
LocationDesc: More refugees have arrived in town.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Angel Pilgrim
Desc: Packs of Angel Pilgrims crawl on all fours, charging toward Watanabe at the end of the road, rumbling thunderously through the valley.\nYou had just destroyed the enemy's retreat route. Standing atop a slope, you are about to give new battle orders to the War Knight.
RoleContents: ['Come together, you Sanctuary bastards.']
LocationDesc: Pure-white giants are charging toward you.
LocationDescUnselect: Pure-white giants are charging toward you.

Name: Angel Pilgrim
Desc: With Watanabe's firepower support, you leap down, fling out your gun's grappling hook, and move nimbly around the pilgrims. Their massive bodies jam the narrow pass, trampling each other. Soon, more than half of them are killed or injured.\n\nWatanabe seizes the opportunity and charges into the enemy ranks, launching a fatal strike at the final Pilgrim.
LocationDesc: Pure-white giants are charging toward you.
LocationDescUnselect: Pure-white giants are charging toward you.

Name: Angel Pilgrim
Desc: You find a crumbling stone pillar and signal for Watanabe to continue engaging the enemy while you ignite the remaining explosives.\n\nWith a series of deafening explosions, the huge pillar crashes down into the enemy ranks, splashing blood in all directions. You and Watanabe rush into the bloody dust together, slaughtering the remaining enemies.
LocationDesc: Pure-white giants are charging toward you.
LocationDescUnselect: Pure-white giants are charging toward you.

Name: Judgment Paladin
Desc: The Judgment Paladin descends into the valley. It spreads its wings of light, like a god of retribution. Its thick metal joints spew scalding steam.\n\nYou vaguely see a golden pillar-like object embedded in its back, flickering rhythmically like a heartbeat.
RoleContents: ['Find its weak points and focus fire.']
LocationDesc: The Sanctuary reinforcements descend from the sky, their graceful luster gleaming under the blazing sun.
LocationDescUnselect: The Sanctuary reinforcements descend from the sky, their graceful luster gleaming under the blazing sun.

Name: Judgment Paladin
Desc: You ask Watanabe to unleash full firepower to draw its attention while you flank behind, firing at the glowing pillar on its back.\n\nA crackling explosion echoes through the valley. As if struck by lightning, the Judgment Paladin convulses and collapses to the ground, smoke pouring from its body. Watanabe seizes the moment and pursues the falling enemy.
LocationDesc: The Sanctuary reinforcements descend from the sky, their graceful luster gleaming under the blazing sun.
LocationDescUnselect: The Sanctuary reinforcements descend from the sky, their graceful luster gleaming under the blazing sun.

Name: Judgment Paladin
Desc: You ask Watanabe to focus fire on the light-wings on the Paladin's back. After several rounds of close combat, you find an opening, throw a rope from the side-rear, hooking its wings.\n\nYou climb up a high slope and then leap down. With a crisp snapping sound, the Paladin crashed to the ground. Now is the time to slay it.
LocationDesc: The Sanctuary reinforcements descend from the sky, their graceful luster gleaming under the blazing sun.
LocationDescUnselect: The Sanctuary reinforcements descend from the sky, their graceful luster gleaming under the blazing sun.

Name: Sanctuary Sin Eater
Desc: Amid the corpses and blood you created, a pitch-black Sanctuary creature opens its gaping mouth like an insatiable beast, greedily devouring the flesh and blood of angels.\n\nOne by one, heads burst from the swollen flesh, forming the creature's twisted shape. Now, it slowly aims its gaping maw at you, like an abyss staring at prey.
RoleContents: ['We must not let this monster continue to grow. Eliminate it immediately.']
LocationDesc: The twisted creature devours bones and blood, swelling and growing.
LocationDescUnselect: The twisted creature devours bones and blood, swelling and growing.

Name: Sanctuary Sin Eater
Desc: You and Watanabe pull your triggers simultaneously. Almost at the same time, countless demonic muskets respond to your command, spraying tens of thousands of blood bullets toward the Sanctuary creature's mouth.\n\nA series of dull thuds erupt from within its body, spraying foul blood. The creature lets out a hoarse wail. You both grip your weapons and charge at it.
LocationDesc: The twisted creature devours bones and blood, swelling and growing.
LocationDescUnselect: The twisted creature devours bones and blood, swelling and growing.

Name: Sanctuary Sin Eater
Desc: You ask Watanabe to keep firing while you use a grappling hook to leap around its body, carefully avoiding its gaping mouth. You search for openings, and slash at its limbs with the bayonet on your rifle.\n\nFinally, after a tough engagement, you successfully sever its legs. The bizarre Sanctuary creature crashes to the ground, like prey awaiting slaughter, twisting and struggling.
LocationDesc: The twisted creature devours bones and blood, swelling and growing.
LocationDescUnselect: The twisted creature devours bones and blood, swelling and growing.

Name: Blood Tax Overseer
Desc:
Your gaze sweeps over the pilgrim army formation, sharply catching sight of an angel with a bizarre appearance. 

It is waving a peculiarly shaped scepter in the same direction as the pilgrim's march, as if it is commanding the army.
You remember—it is the "Blood Tax Overseer" Watanabe once spoke of, the core of the angel army.
RoleContents: ["Take it down, and the army's strength will be greatly weakened."]
LocationDesc: An angel holding a scepter is commanding the army.
LocationDescUnselect: An angel holding a scepter is commanding the army.

Name: Blood Tax Overseer
Desc: With Watanabe's firepower support, you dash from the flank and shoot out your grappling hook, flying toward the Blood Tax Overseer and snatching the scepter with ease.\n\nWithout hesitation, you raise the scepter toward the Overseer. Almost instantly, the pilgrim troops suddenly turn their heads and begin trampling their own allies. You and Watanabe take the chance and launch a counterattack.
LocationDesc: An angel holding a scepter is commanding the army.
LocationDescUnselect: An angel holding a scepter is commanding the army.

Name: Blood Tax Overseer
Desc: You observe that whenever the Blood-Tax Overseer swings its scepter, its head splits into four fleshy petals, revealing a core inside.\n\nYou find an opportunity to fire at the exposed core. The gunshot echoes through the valley. The Overseer writhes, letting out a piercing shriek, its scepter flailing wildly, throwing the angelic army into chaos. The time for counterattack has come.
LocationDesc: An angel holding a scepter is commanding the army.
LocationDescUnselect: An angel holding a scepter is commanding the army.

Name: Glowing Cell

LocationDesc: A faint glow in the dungeon has caught everyone's attention.
LocationDescUnselect: A faint glow in the dungeon has caught everyone's attention.

LocationDesc: Launch a counterattack toward the enemy's gathering point.
LocationDescUnselect: Launch a counterattack toward the enemy's gathering point.

LocationDescUnselect: A few soldiers have proposed seizing the interrogation room to rescue their tortured comrades.

LocationDescUnselect: A sharp-eyed soldier suggests heading straight for the warden's room. The key to the dungeon gate must be there.

LocationDescUnselect: Finally, you bathe in the light of freedom.

Name: Echoes of Civilization

RoleContents: ['Oh my, what a rare guest! Please, you must try the hottest new attraction across the entire Purgatory—the Mammon Lottery! Everyone is guaranteed to win!']

LocationDesc: Silence envelops the blood-red haze, blurring the line between reality and illusion.

Name: The Dream-Selling Devil
Desc: Demons cannot dream naturally, so dream-selling devils are their only escape from reality.
RoleContents: ["You're not naive enough to deal with a devil, are you? All of Mammon's lackeys deserve to die. Trust me—kill it."]
LocationDesc: Silence envelops the blood-red haze, blurring the line between reality and illusion.

Name: The Dream-Selling Devil
Desc: The Death Knight frowns slightly as you take the colorful floating bubble from the devil's hand. As your fingertip touches its surface, the whole world suddenly dims. Unfamiliar, fantastical scenes flash past you like a speeding train.\nYou see piles of glowing treasure all around.
LocationDesc: Silence envelops the blood-red haze, blurring the line between reality and illusion.

Name: The Dream-Selling Devil

Name: The Dream-Selling Devil

LocationDesc: Silence envelops the blood-red haze, blurring the line between reality and illusion.

Name: The Dream-Selling Devil

LocationDesc: Silence envelops the blood-red haze, blurring the line between reality and illusion.

Name: Acheron Shark
Desc: The horseshoes step through the shallows without splashing. This, along with the sticky feeling suddenly spreading across your skin and the noise that abruptly rings in your ear, alerts you.\nUnder the bloody crescent moon's dim glow, a finned, spindle-shaped shadow leaps into the air. Your eyes can barely track where the giant shark's head or tail begins.
RoleContents: ["Dodge quickly! That thing's no joke!"]
LocationDesc: The river surface is as thick as cooled blood, its stench reeking of death.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Acheron Shark
Desc: You raise your whip, and your mount swiftly turns in another direction. A loud splash erupts behind you, and the river returns to calm moments later. A floating barrel near the shore glows faintly, catching your attention.
LocationDesc: The river surface is as thick as cooled blood, its stench reeking of death.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Acheron Shark
Desc: The commotion caused by the shark awakens lurking enemies. A skirmish is now unavoidable. The Death Knight raises her dual-bladed lance, grinning at the oncoming tide of foes—she's ready to test her reclaimed power on these trash.
LocationDesc: The river surface is as thick as cooled blood, its stench reeking of death.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Acheron Shark
Desc: With no time to dodge, you have to brace for impact. The giant shark has no interest in you, but the creatures in the Acheron awakened by the noise are now closing in.\nThe Death Knight grips her dual-headed lance and turns to you with an invitation: "Try those new moves you've been working on. Don't let me down!"
LocationDesc: The river surface is as thick as cooled blood, its stench reeking of death.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Hag of Hell
Desc: "Traveler, take this feather—it can detect lies, tickle itches, and even ride the wind to help you find the flow of the Acheron River." A hooded fortune-teller blocks your path, offering a mysterious invitation. A crow with black wings screeches on her shoulder.
LocationDesc: A hunched old woman blocks your way.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Hag of Hell
Desc: The feather quivers in the wind. You carefully examine it, then set off again. Soon, you come upon a lone angel squad near a rocky pit.\nAfter defeating them, you discover a rust-covered treasure chest inside the pit. Perhaps the hag wasn't lying after all—who knows?
LocationDesc: A hunched old woman blocks your way.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Hag of Hell
Desc: You notice her open satchel is full of gray-brown feathers, and deeper inside, you can faintly see supplies stained with blood. Clearly, this "fortune-teller" was just a roadside robber.\nYou and the Death Knight eliminate this menace together, take some useful supplies, and continue your march deeper into Hell.
LocationDesc: A hunched old woman blocks your way.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Ambush Site
Desc: The mountain path glitters with translucent shards, reflecting a brilliance unfit for Hell. The stench of rot hangs in the air. You calm your mount and decide to dismount to investigate.
LocationDesc: The shards on the path shimmer brightly.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Ambush Site
Desc: Upon close inspection, you find gravel and dirt covering the demons' incomplete corpses. Fresh wounds and angel bite marks confirm they were attacked recently. You notice the scattered shards are actually broken runes.
RoleContents: ['Greed is the most common sin. Even when these fools were already in Hell, they died again for treasure.']
LocationDesc: The shards on the path shimmer brightly.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Ambush Site
Desc: You bend down to gather the scattered runes and wrap them in your cloak's side pocket.
LocationDesc: The shards on the path shimmer brightly.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Ambush Site
Desc: Suddenly, a large group of angels emerges from the surrounding mounds. You quickly draw your weapon and stand back-to-back with the Death Knight to face the ambush.
LocationDesc: The shards on the path shimmer brightly.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Ambush Site
Desc: You want to take the beads, but letting your guard down in such danger is unwise. You and the Death Knight charge at the mound on one side, swiftly wiping out the angels lurking there.
LocationDesc: The shards on the path shimmer brightly.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Ambush Site
Desc: After the battle, you collect the scattered runes and continue your journey.
LocationDesc: The shards on the path shimmer brightly.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Lone Demon Warrior
Desc: You recognize the battle cries of demon warriors—and the terrifying screeches of angels. As you remove your weapon from your shoulder, the Death Knight raises her whip, and your mounts gallop together toward the source of the sounds.
RoleContents: ['It must be a lone squad separated from the main force. Help them if we can!']
LocationDesc: Familiar war cries echo from the distant horizon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Lone Demon Warrior
Desc: You and the Death Knight charge into the enemy ranks, eliminating all the angels surrounding the lone demon squad.\nYou point them toward the demon formation in the Valley of Ash. The grateful demon leader gifts you the squad's remaining supplies in exchange.
LocationDesc: Familiar war cries echo from the distant horizon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Lone Demon Warrior
Desc: You approach the battleground via a side path, only to find the cries of demons and angels have both faded: the last standing warrior drove their blade into an enemy's chest before collapsing.\nAfter cleaning up the field, you gather the squad's remaining supplies and prepare to move on.
LocationDesc: Familiar war cries echo from the distant horizon.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Excavation
Desc: In one battle, the entrenching shovel that has always been carried on your back falls to the ground. As the blood on its surface drips into the mud, hazy memories begin to surface. You remember a rugged riverbank, where you once dug through ancient silt and met your knight, and then...
RoleContents: ["You used this shovel to dig me out, didn't you?"]
LocationDesc: "The earth shook, and the rocks split. The tombs broke open, and the sleeping Ferryman emerged, revealing herself to the Bloodsworn."
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Old Tales from the Grand Library
Desc: You and the death knight pass by a dilapidated library. She pushes open the rotting door, picks up an old book titled "The History of the Supreme Expedition," sits on a bench, crosses her legs, and lightly flips through the pages.\nWhen you ask her about the content of the book, she glances at you, then slowly opens her mouth and tells you a piece of ancient history.
LocationName: Old Tales from the Grand Library
LocationDesc: Admire the weight of history.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Old Tales from the Grand Library
Desc: The laws of life and death judged the fate of human souls: the noble rose to the Sanctuary, the wicked fell into Hell. Long ago, demons opened a rift in the human world known as the "Rift of Chaos," pouring in and slaughtering humans. To stop the spread of demonic evil, the merciful Cardinal Deity bestowed civilization upon humanity and guided them into the long "Supreme Expedition" toward the Rift of Chaos.
RoleContents: ['So this is how humans frame their wars... How self-aggrandizing.']
LocationName: Old Tales from the Grand Library
LocationDesc: Admire the weight of history.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Demon Lord's Expedition
Desc: You walk with the Death Knight across the Scorched Borderland. You notice that she avoids contact with other humans, cautiously observing the villages along the way like a hunter deep inside a beast's lair.\nNoticing your confusion, she scoffs, "What, do you expect a 'Demon Lord' to play nice with humans?"
LocationDesc: The Death Knight's behavior has caught your attention.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Demon Lord's Expedition
Desc: Her words stir dormant memories in you. You realize that the knight before you may come from a far more distant and terrifying place...
RoleContents: ['What are you standing there for? Keep moving.']
LocationDesc: The Death Knight's behavior has caught your attention.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Where Do Souls Rest
Desc: You pass through a battlefield scarred by craters and bullet holes. The Death Knight, drawn by some unknown power, walks straight to a crater, picking up a skull-shaped pendant from the rubble.\nClutching it in her palm, she closes her eyes for several dozen seconds, then frowns: "Even here, I cannot sense the presence of the 'Death Lord'... dammit."
LocationDesc: Death calls.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Where Do Souls Rest
Desc: You recall that the Death Lord, Nyarlathotep, is the demon king who rules Hell and governs the laws of life and death. Maybe the "Death Knight" before you is connected to Him in some ways? As you ponder, she continues to march forward, so you stop pursuing the thought further.
RoleContents: ["Can you still keep up? Don't push yourself—I'm not carrying you back."]
LocationDesc: Death calls.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Hell Train
Desc: Twilight stains the valley red, and everything visible is covered with a dreamlike sheen. To help you recover your memories faster, the Death Knight brings you to a station beside the inn. She pulls back the tarp covering the rails, revealing a steam locomotive made of black steel, shaped like a sharp steel spike, ready to tear through enemies ahead.
LocationDesc: Hey, Demon King—you did this to yourself / Hey, Mama—watch me now / I'm riding the Hellrail, ain't nothing can stop me now.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Hell Train
Desc: The recent train heist flashes through your mind—you remember this was the Hell Train you and the four knights stole. The Death Knight looks at you and says, "Remember now? This is my steed. We'll use it to settle scores with the Sanctuary."
RoleContents: ['Starting to remember a little? Good. I\'m still waiting for you to honor our "pact."']
LocationDesc: Hey, Demon King—you did this to yourself / Hey, Mama—watch me now / I'm riding the Hellrail, ain't nothing can stop me now.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Weight of Souls
Desc:
Cold river water floods your body. Hallucinations unfold before your eyes...
"...Therefore!" You stand at the podium, waving your arms passionately, trying to pour all the knowledge in your brain into them.
"The mapping results of the alchemy matrix are already quite clear—souls are a tangible entity attached to our flesh and blood!"
Thunderous applause erupts from the audience. Immersed in the moment, you continue, "Matter is indestructible, the soul is immortal—we've indirectly proven the existence of reincarnation!"
"Heroes rise to the Sanctuary, wretches fall into Hell—this must be the cycle of souls!"
LocationDesc: You see a classroom packed with students.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Weight of Souls
Desc: You could not see what happened next, nor did you know why this memory fragment appeared in the Acheron River. But regardless, you had witnessed the birth of the transmigration theory.\nFrom then on, people believed that the soul of the deceased would either ascend to Heaven or descend into Hell.
LocationDesc: You see a classroom packed with students.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Judgment of the Soul
Desc: Cold river water floods your body. Hallucinations unfold before your eyes...\nYou open your eyes and find yourself bound to a cold steel chair. Suddenly, a deafening hum shatters the silence. Hundreds of massive silver rings whirl like nooses before you. Beams of light pour down from the dome's glass skylight, illuminating your surroundings. You are at the center of a colossal armillary sphere, surrounded by white-robed judges.\n"Aleksei Yefimovich, your crimes are laid bare before the Crown of Judgment. Eight years ago, you smuggled supplies from the Army. Three years ago, you murdered an old woman in the wild..."
LocationDesc: You witness a suffocating trial.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Judgment of the Soul
Desc: "The Court hereby sentences you to death."\nAmid the crackle of electricity, despair and regret drown you.
LocationDesc: You witness a suffocating trial.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Witnessing the Cataclysm
Desc: Cold river water floods your body. Hallucinations unfold before your eyes...\nChains from the heavens tear through the skies, piercing through the Rift of Chaos, penetrating the entire Hell. Thunder roars, the earth cracks open... Even the most vicious demons tremble at this apocalyptic sight.\nThe chains bind the towering figure of Nyarlathotep, the Death Lord, whose furious howls echo across the nine heavens. But not even this ruler of life and death can defy the judgment of the Creator of the Three Realms,The Father of All Souls on Scorched Earth—the Supreme Heaven.
LocationDesc: You witness the exact moment when the Cataclysm arrives.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Witnessing the Cataclysm
Desc: With a thunderous boom, the gates of the Hall of A Thousand Demons slam shut, sealing Nyarlathotep and his laws of death away from the world. From that day on, the cycle of life and death fell into disarray. Souls could no longer ascend to heaven or descend to Hell after death. Instead, they become wandering, living dead trapped in the mortal world.\nThis was once witnessed by a demon—or perhaps, the entire Hell.
LocationDesc: You witness the exact moment when the Cataclysm arrives.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Secrets of The Golden King
Desc: Cold river water floods your body. Hallucinations unfold before your eyes...\nYou stretch out your red fingers, rubbing your drowsy eyes. Before you lies a glittering paradise. After a century of excavation, you have finally unearthed the vein beneath the Valley of Ash and found the gateway to "Purgatory"! Now, you are certain that you will be the first demon to step into that legendary realm.\nThe Purgatory Furnace, said to have minted all the gold coins, is glowing just on the other side of the gateway. Trembling, you reach out, embracing the warm radiance of the mountains of treasure—
LocationDesc: You see the Purgatory Furnace.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Secrets of The Golden King
Desc: The moment you cross the gateway, flames engulf your body. Before you can feel the agony, you are already melted down with the bones of all greedy souls before you, becoming the one-thousandth pair of eyes craved in the coin press's ceiling.\nOf course, your soul remains the property of Hell, sinking into the depths of the Acheron River.
LocationDesc: You see the Purgatory Furnace.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: War of the Abyss
Desc:
Cold river water floods your body. Hallucinations unfold before your eyes...
War drums, shrieks, and the sickening crack of shattered bone and flesh twist together, dragging you into a battlefield soaked in gore.
Wielding a great blade forged of infernal steel, you charge into the sea of enemies before you. Your feet crush the severed limbs and burst skulls of other demons as you carve a path of carnage, soaked in blood.
Behind you, your employer—the Locust Flame Demon, Larsados—sways a goblet brimming with fresh human blood, watching your slaughter with amused admiration. And at the far end of the field, the enemy commander—the Abyssal Crow King, Morigan—draws his colossal scythe, eager for a duel.
LocationDesc: You see the Eternal War of the Abyss.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: War of the Abyss
Desc: The Death Lord has decreed that Demon Lords must never slay one another. Thus, they hire high-ranking demons like you for proxy wars, hoping to eliminate their rivals indirectly.\nA lethal stroke finds your neck eventually. Like the countless corpses beneath your feet, you fall, lifeless, into the frigid depths of the Acheron River.
LocationDesc: You see the Eternal War of the Abyss.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Unlucky Wandering Devil
Desc: Cold river water floods your body. Hallucinations unfold before your eyes...\nYou push a little cart full of runes and shiny trinkets, wandering across the savage and desolate wastes of Hell.\nAs a law-abiding devil, you cannot for the life of you understand why the agency assigned you to this isolated land where violence is law. Day after day, you explain to the illiterate locals: "Devils are devils. Demons are demons. We devils live next door in Purgatory, while you demons live here in this stinking Hell! Can't you understand? Demons love killing. Devils love making money!"
LocationDesc: You hear the wandering devil's final muttering.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Unlucky Wandering Devil
Desc: You mutter to yourself, not watching where you're going, until your cart crashes into two hulking figures. They turn with bare fangs, grinning. Just as you open your mouth to offer a sales pitch, the world spins, and blackness claims your vision.\nThat was the last thing you could remember. You were mugged by those filthy demons!
LocationDesc: You hear the wandering devil's final muttering.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Kaleidoscope Demon Fortress
Desc: You chase Witch Haida through the grand, ever-shifting halls of the Demon Fortress. The dark red walls around you seem to be under her influence as they bulge and warp at random, blocking your path ahead. The entire space has become a twisting labyrinth. You feel like she is somewhere nearby, watching your every move and luring you into ever more intricate traps.
RoleContents: ['Open your eyes wide. She is right here, I can feel her.']
LocationDesc: The witch disappears, leaving behind a deadly maze.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Claws of Chaos
Desc: The last angel falls before you. Before you can catch your breath, the Chaos Gate Emissary raises its talons, ripping open a rift. The anguished screams of angels converge into a crashing white tide, hurtling toward you.
LocationDesc: The frail girl continues to mumble.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Claws of Chaos
Desc: The Death Knight steps in front of you, lifting her flame-wreathed blade and cleaving the blood ocean in reverse. "That's an Arcane Gate—or a 'Rift of Chaos' as you humans call it. It once allowed demons into your world. But ironically, the Sanctuary is now using it to send angels into Hell... Convenient, isn't it?"
RoleContents: ['No one will leave alive!']
LocationDesc: The frail girl continues to mumble.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Silent Emissary
Desc: The witch slips through the streets and alleyways like a fish, leading you around in circles back to where you started. At this moment, you suddenly realize that while you were locked in battle with the witch, the "Chaos Gate Emissary" just stood there all along, staring blankly into the empty space before her. And the "egg" rooted in her chest is swelling and growing at a visible rate, pulsing and glowing like a beating heart—a sight that sends chills down your spine.
RoleContents: ['Tch, this fish is just stalling us. We need to take her down fast.']
LocationDesc: The girl in the corner remains silent.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Mermaid's Treasure
Desc: You find a heavily worn fountain pen in the corridor. Its cap is engraved with an elegant name: Lustrous.\nYou find other strange items along the way—a cloudy marble, a shattered coffee cup, and many more objects that do not belong here.
LocationDesc: You have picked up many peculiar trinkets.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Mermaid's Treasure
Desc: Demons crossed the Acheron River naked, entered the Ferryman's fortress, and left in the same manner, facing their void fates... Now that all the demons are gone, only these worthless little items remain. Did Witch Haida collect them out of greed, or... out of some more inscrutable emotion?
RoleContents: ['She is right ahead. Keep going after her.']
LocationDesc: You have picked up many peculiar trinkets.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Scroll of the Valley of Ash
Desc: After a long chase, you veer into a grand and chaotic library. Countless books lie strewn across the floor, piled into grey, dusty hills. Dim light filters through the carved window lattice, falling on a scroll glowing with a faint red gleam. According to the Death Knight, that is the Scroll of the Valley of Ash—an artifact that only existed in legends.
LocationName: The Scroll of the Valley of Ash
LocationDesc: You arrive at the Demon Fortress's Great Library.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Scroll of the Valley of Ash
Desc: The scroll contains a cryptic omen about the Omega Egg: "When the egg hatches, it shall cleanse Hell of all corruption. The dead of past and future shall rise anew."
RoleContents: ['The dead shall rise anew... Did that stupid fish turn the library upside down just for this?']
LocationName: The Scroll of the Valley of Ash
LocationDesc: You arrive at the Demon Fortress's Great Library.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: The Witch's Chessboard
Desc: You push open the door and enter a room with a relaxing vibe. Simple clothes and picture books are strewn casually over a plush sofa. On the spotless floor lie scattered chess pieces carved with various faces, and at their center is a handmade chessboard with the creator's signature carved into the frame's corner: Hell's Greatest Demon!
RoleContents: ['Playtime is over.']
LocationDesc: What harm could the witch possibly mean? She just wants someone to play with.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lie secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Accelerate Forward
Desc: The Death Knight scoffs at the tide of enemies, gently placing her hand on the steam engine's enchanted sigils. As crimson light flares, the Hell Train lets out a soul-shaking roar and charges out of the valley, incinerating everything in its path.
RoleContents: ['Here—we carve the road through Hell!']
LocationDesc: The engine's thunderous scream splits the sky, drawing the attention of angels.
LocationDescUnselect: The engine's thunderous scream splits the sky, drawing the attention of angels.

Name: Clear the Tracks
Desc: The Death Knight fuels the engine, hurling the train forward. Angels rain down from the skies, forming a white wall ahead over the tracks using their very flesh to block your advance.\nYou climb to the roof without hesitation, unleashing full firepower to carve a bloody path ahead.
RoleContents: ['Great work. Now hold tight!']
LocationDesc: The engine's thunderous scream splits the sky, drawing the attention of angels.
LocationDescUnselect: The engine's thunderous scream splits the sky, drawing the attention of angels.

Name: Defend the Boiler Room
Desc: As long as the steam engine is running, nothing can stop your journey to Hell. You stand shoulder to shoulder with the Death Knight, vowing to hold the boiler room at all costs.
RoleContents: ["Stay closer to the fire. Those Sanctuary rats won't set one foot in here."]
LocationDesc: More and more angels begin swarming the train.
LocationDescUnselect: More and more angels begin swarming the train.

Name: Guerrilla Warfare
Desc: You leave the boiler room to the Death Knight and begin weaving through the narrow train, setting up traps while annihilating the invading angel forces.
RoleContents: ["Always watch your back. Don't die where I can't see you!"]
ConfirmContent: I'll be back. Wait for me.
LocationDesc: More and more angels begin swarming the train.
LocationDescUnselect: More and more angels begin swarming the train.

Name: Eliminate External Threats First
Desc: The light outside dims suddenly. A shrill screech rings out. You glance through the window, only to meet the stare of a gargantuan, blood-red eye.\nClearly, you have entered the borderlands of Hell. A colossal Acheron shark is circling the train, ready to strike at any time. Sensing your intent, the Death Knight grabs her dual-bladed lance and charges toward the shark.
RoleContents: ['Feel the searing flames of your fate!']
LocationDesc: The light outside dims suddenly. A shrill screech rings out. You glance through the window, only to meet the stare of a gargantuan, blood-red eye.
LocationDescUnselect: The light outside dims suddenly. A shrill screech rings out. You glance through the window, only to meet the stare of a gargantuan, blood-red eye.

Name: Eliminate Internal Threats First
Desc: The light outside dims suddenly. A shrill screech rings out. You glance through the window, only to meet the stare of a gargantuan, blood-red eye.\nAfter assessing the situation, you decide that clearing the remaining angels inside the cabin is the top priority. Reloading your weapon, you and the Death Knight charge forward, back-to-back, into the white tide.
RoleContents: ["Let's go to hell together, bastards!"]
LocationDesc: The light outside dims suddenly. A shrill screech rings out. You glance through the window, only to meet the stare of a gargantuan, blood-red eye.
LocationDescUnselect: The light outside dims suddenly. A shrill screech rings out. You glance through the window, only to meet the stare of a gargantuan, blood-red eye.

Name: Frontal Assault
Desc: Raising your weapons high, you and the Death Knight give the order for a full-on assault. The thunder of war drums shakes the blood-soaked battlefield as the demon legions let out a long-suppressed roar of fury. Like an avalanche of crimson shadows, tens of thousands of demons surge forth, crashing into the white-clad phalanx under Witch Haida's command.
RoleContents: ['Great! Tear through her defenses from the front!']
LocationDesc: Sensing the surge in the demons' morale, you decide to seize the opportunity and launch an all-out offensive against the angelic army.
LocationDescUnselect: Sensing the surge in the demons' morale, you decide to seize the opportunity and launch an all-out offensive against the angelic army.

Name: Elite Breakthrough
Desc: To support your offensive, Cerberus leads a massive demon force in a feint from the front. Amid the deafening battle cries, you and the Death Knight spur your steeds through a stretch of burning hills, miraculously emerging at the enemy's rear. The enemy's weak flank is now fully exposed to your blades.
RoleContents: ['Follow me! Not a single step back!']
LocationDesc: You decide to lead a small elite force with the Death Knight to flank the angel army.
LocationDescUnselect: You decide to lead a small elite force with the Death Knight to flank the angel army.

Name: Concentrated Breakthrough
Desc: You and the Death Knight commit all remaining reserves, charging headlong into the front lines of the enemy. Like a knife through butter, you carve through the enemy's counterattack, breaking into the fragile rear lines of the angelic forces.
RoleContents: ['Follow me, kill them all!']
LocationDesc: Faced with the angels' desperate retaliation, you choose to push deeper, intensifying the assault.
LocationDescUnselect: Faced with the angels' desperate retaliation, you choose to push deeper, intensifying the assault.

Name: Hold the Line
Desc: As the angels launch a frenzied counteroffensive, you and the Death Knight signal the retreat drums. The two of you remain at the center of the army, calmly directing the formations and transforming the demon legions into an iron wall. After several failed charges, the angels' momentum begins to falter. The Death Knight grips her lance tightly and casts you an eager look.
RoleContents: ["Sound the horns! It's time to strike back!"]
LocationDesc: Faced with the angels' desperate retaliation, you choose to regroup and stabilize the formation, blunting the enemy's momentum.
LocationDescUnselect: Faced with the angels' desperate retaliation, you choose to regroup and stabilize the formation, blunting the enemy's momentum.

Name: Beheading Operation
Desc: Having shattered the angelic formations, you can already see the fear in Witch Haida's face from afar.\nThe Death Knight, exhilarated by the scent of blood, swings her lance and strides toward her nemesis, cutting down all who dare stand in her way. The earth beneath her feet runs red, turning Hell into a smelting furnace of angelic corpses.
RoleContents: ["Struggle all you want—I'll drown you in your own blood!"]
LocationDesc: Launch a surprise strike on Witch Haida.
LocationDescUnselect: Launch a surprise strike on Witch Haida.

Name: Expanding the Advantage
Desc: Rather than rushing headlong at Witch Haida, you and the Death Knight continue commanding with precision, steadily encircling and dismantling the enemy's flanks to secure total dominance.
RoleContents: ['Slay them all. Leave none alive.']
LocationDesc: Continue eliminating all remaining enemy forces.
LocationDescUnselect: Continue eliminating all remaining enemy forces.

Name: Crossing the Pond
Desc: You choose to wade straight through the water ahead. You leave your pursuers behind, trudging slowly with uneven steps. Suddenly, something soft brushes past your leg. Looking down, you see a massive shadow gliding silently between the two of you.
RoleContents: ["Hold tight—watch the water! It's an Acheron shark!"]
LocationDesc: A waist-deep pond blocks your path.
LocationDescUnselect: A waist-deep pond blocks your path.

Name: Find Another Way
Desc: You decide to skirt the pond and look for an alternative route. The Death Knight ignites a flame and strides ahead, leading the way. Before long, you enter a narrow, pitch-black corridor echoing with illusory moaning. She raises her flame to illuminate a bone-chilling sight: \nDozens of angels cling to the ceiling like insects, their heads twisting slowly, drool dripping from their mouths as they silently gaze down upon you.
RoleContents: ["Come on! I'm going to slay all of you!"]
LocationDesc: A waist-deep pond blocks your path.
LocationDescUnselect: A waist-deep pond blocks your path.

Name: The Grim Altar
Desc: You step into a room reeking of blood. In its center lies a crimson ritual circle, at the heart of which stands a statue of the Death Lord. The surrounding tables are strewn with bloodstained torture tools.\nFrom the shadows at the far end of the room comes a growl. A massive angel, its mouth smeared with blood, slowly crawls into view, its gaping jaws opening wide.
RoleContents: ['Had your fill? Then prepare for your death!']
LocationDesc: You fight your way forward fiercely and arrive at a crossroads.
LocationDescUnselect: You fight your way forward fiercely and arrive at a crossroads.

Name: Sulfur Warehouse
Desc: Following the scent of sulfur, the Death Knight leads you into a warehouse overflowing with yellow powder. She grins fiercely, scooping up a handful: "Perfect—this will do just fine..." She turns, flinging the sulfur into the tide of enemies and then ignites her lance. "Let's burn these wretches to ash!"
RoleContents: ['Come, step into the abyss of flames!']
LocationDesc: You fight your way forward fiercely and arrive at a crossroads.
LocationDescUnselect: You fight your way forward fiercely and arrive at a crossroads.

Name: Open the Floodgates
Desc: The Death Knight swiftly kicks a rusted iron lever. Far away, a hinge groans as an ancient, decayed gate creaks open. In the next instant, freezing river water bursts forth, flooding into the catacombs and engulfing hundreds of angels in its path. Countless "stones" in the water awaken with burning fury and hatred, devouring the invaders.\nThe overwhelming torrent roars behind you, sweeping through the catacombs and clearing a path forward.
RoleContents: ["My flame can split the Acheron's water—stay with me!"]
LocationDesc: You reach the water gate at the top of the dungeon, but angels are swarming in all around you.
LocationDescUnselect: You reach the water gate at the top of the dungeon, but angels are swarming in all around you.

Name: Frontal Breakthrough
Desc: Exhausted from your long march, your patience is at its end. The Death Knight snaps her lance in two, gripping one in each hand, smirking at the overwhelming white tide of enemies.\nShe turns to you and says, "I'll count to three. On three, run like hell."
RoleContents: ['My blades will carve your path!']
LocationDesc: You reach the water gate at the top of the dungeon, but angels are swarming in all around you.
LocationDescUnselect: You reach the water gate at the top of the dungeon, but angels are swarming in all around you.

Name: Support the Death Knight
Desc: Dodging snapping angelic jaws, you aim at the mermaid's distant silhouette and unload your blood bullets.\nCaught off guard, the witch shrieks and frantically swings her halberd blade. Seizing the moment, the Death Knight tightens her grip, charges forward, and unleashes a storm of relentless strikes upon her.
RoleContents: ["You've got nowhere left to run!"]
LocationDesc: In the deepest part of the Demon Fortress, the Death Knight and Witch Haida engage in a duel.
LocationDescUnselect: In the deepest part of the Demon Fortress, the Death Knight and Witch Haida engage in a duel.

Name: Eliminate the Angels First
Desc: You trust the Death Knight to handle the witch and focus on keeping the angels swarming out of the Arcane Gate from interfering in their battle.\nRolling aside, you reload your last rounds and pull the trigger at the tide of enemies.
RoleContents: ['All that move upon the earth, all that wander between heaven and earth... shall perish.']
LocationDesc: In the deepest part of the Demon Fortress, the Death Knight and Witch Haida engage in a duel.
LocationDescUnselect: In the deepest part of the Demon Fortress, the Death Knight and Witch Haida engage in a duel.

Name: The Final Charge: Cleaving the Waves
Desc: As waves crash toward you from all directions, the Death Knight grins savagely. She breaks her dual-bladed lance in two and unleashes an almighty strike toward the rotting world ahead.
RoleContents: ['Brace yourself for the relentless bite of pain!']
LocationName: The Final Charge: Cleaving the Waves
LocationDesc: Witch Haida raises her halberd, and waters from the Acheron River surge in from all directions.
LocationDescUnselect: Witch Haida raises her halberd, and waters from the Acheron River surge in from all directions.

Name: Calling Upon the "Stones" in the River
Desc: The Death Knight stands motionless like a statue that has watched over the shore for a thousand years, letting the cold river water lash her skin.\nCountless vengeful spirits swirl in her mind, their presence carving scars deep into her limbs and bones... After what feels like centuries of torment, her eyes snap open. She raises her lance high, and the world seems to tremble. The waves split before her. Behind her, a vast army of spirits forms a chilling battle formation, awaiting the "Ferryman" to lead them into battle—and into their final peace.
RoleContents: ['Take a piece of flesh... from the body of mine!']
LocationName: Calling Upon the "Stones" in the River
LocationDesc: Witch Haida raises her halberd, and waters from the Acheron River surge in from all directions.
LocationDescUnselect: Witch Haida raises her halberd, and waters from the Acheron River surge in from all directions.

Name: Plague Doctor
Desc: You notice that the silver-haired young man is wearing a bird-beaked mask, steeped in the scent of herbs. It's finely crafted, but bears the wear and tear of long years in use.
LocationDesc: He severs disease. He lays the dead to rest.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Plague Doctor
Desc: A familiar memory rises to the surfaces. When you traveled together through the forest, he would gather herbs during rest stops, either to heal minor wounds or to prepare a simple herbal meal. He carried himself with a calm and composure far beyond what his youthful appearance might suggest.\n\nThe Plague Doctor—that was how the survivors you encountered on your journey would refer to Wanshi with reverence.
RoleContents: ['Are you feeling better...? If anything still hurts, let me know right away.']
LocationDesc: He severs disease. He lays the dead to rest.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Living Sacrifice Ritual
Desc: The day stretches on endlessly. You come upon yet another ritual site, its ground soaked in blood. Whatever clues once left have long been erased by wind and sand. Only faint traces remain to suggest that tribespeople once conducted their activities here.
LocationDesc: You both travel in the wake of a catastrophe.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Living Sacrifice Ritual
Desc: "We're too late..."\n\nHis voice, laced with frustration, stirs a memory long buried in your heart. Not long ago, while tracing the aftermath of a catastrophe, you found a silver-haired young man collapsed at the site of another living sacrifice ritual, unconscious from massive blood loss and on the verge of death. To save his life, you had no choice but to make a decision.
RoleContents: ["Come on, let's keep moving."]
LocationDesc: You both travel in the wake of a catastrophe.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: "Carcosa"
Desc: During a brief rest stop, he shows you his research notes. On the yellowed pages are sketches of twisted totems and a strange name: Carcosa.
LocationDesc: Shadows from the past still haunt you.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: "Carcosa"
Desc: You vaguely recall that before meeting him, you had also encountered a ragged band of tribespeople, their minds unhinged, muttering "Carcosa" as they raised their blades over innocent townspeople at a ritual site.\n\n"...Do you remember now? Thank you for saving my life." Seeing your face contort in pain as the memories return, the young man gently wipes the cold sweat from your forehead, trying to ease your discomfort.
RoleContents: ["Your memories are starting to return. That's a good sign. Just don't push yourself."]
LocationDesc: Shadows from the past still haunt you.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Fight the Living Dead
Desc: Bang—with a deafening gunshot, another Living Dead is torn to shreds in the gunsmoke. Foul blood splatters across his robes, but he wipes it away with the calm of routine. Then, lifting his lantern, he quietly performs the final rites for the souls.
LocationDesc: Sometimes, to save lives, one has no choice but to raise their gun.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Fight the Living Dead
Desc: You notice that he seems quite accustomed to fighting the Living Dead. As he tends to his weapons, you tentatively bring up the topic, to which he responds with surprising composure:\n\n"The Living Dead is no longer truly alive. If that's the case, then I might as well grant them release."
RoleContents: ["Let's keep moving. We can't stop here."]
LocationDesc: Sometimes, to save lives, one has no choice but to raise their gun.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Blood Locust Plague
Desc: You push open the door from inside an abandoned house, only to find the exterior wall covered with dead blood locusts. Though they've long since decayed and weathered away, you can still imagine how desperately this family tried to barricade the door when the swarm invaded.
LocationDesc: The catastrophe destroyed everything—but not the human will.
LocationDescUnselect: Here lies secrets you have not uncovered...

Name: Blood Locust Plague
Desc: Just beyond the door, a corpse slumps on the ground, drained of blood. A shotgun lies beside them, its ammunition consumed. It seems they stayed behind alone to hold off the blood locusts, so the rest of their family could escape.\n\nYou and Wanshi give the person a proper burial, while silently praying that such tragedies will never again befall this land.
